title: Land For Sale-mawaramandiya (deranagama Junction)
details: Just 200 Mts From The Main Colombo - Delgoda Main Road, Passing Mawaramandiya At Deranagama Junction, This 10.5 Perch Square Block Of Land Is A Superb Block. Very Quiet Surroundings On Temple Road, The Land Boast Of Tap Water And Electricity.
